DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) efficacy ACZONE Gel , 7.5 % administer topically once-daily 12 week 9 11 year-olds acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Trial ACZONE ( Dapsone ) Gel , 7.5 % 9 11 Year-Old Patients With Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Has acne vulgaris face , include nose , 20 100 total lesion ( noninflammatory and/or inflammatory ) . Has uncontrolled systemic disease ( ) Has severe cystic acne , acne conglobata , acne fulminans , secondary acne ( chloracne , druginduced acne ) Has use topical dapsone within 1 month prior screening Has use oral dapsone within 2 month prior screen .
